text:
We use the jikes compiler for nearly everything, except the borland stub 
generation using Ant doesn't pay attention to the build.compiler setting.  This 
causes our builds to take an inordinate amount of time.

The usage details for java2iiop specify that the user can use a different 
compiler with the -compiler flag.  If this is too hard, the ability to add args 
to the command line would suffice.
creator: tamm@alum.mit.edu
bruce@callenish.com
text: This bug request has been overcome by history. The Borland Application Server now implements the J2EE spec fully.
